<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Leap and Fire](/Feats.aspx?ID=3179) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 115</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Hit the Dirt!](/Feats.aspx?ID=3157)

</column>

---

You're quick enough to line up a shot even while diving to the ground. When you use your Hit the Dirt! reaction, at any point during your [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81) you can also make a ranged Strike with a loaded firearm or crossbow, targeting the creature whose attack triggered the reaction.
name: Leap and Fire
